node.title: Are Stores Open on Thanksgiving 2021? Opening Hours for Walmart, CVS, Costco and More
node.alt: The exterior of a Walmart store in North Bergen, New Jersey, seen on August 23, 2020.
node.description: Thanksgiving is a federal holiday, which means many public institutions will be closed so families can come together for the festivities.
node.content:
["Thanksgiving is a federal holiday, which means many public institutions will be closed so families can come together for the festivities.", "Most stores in the U.S. are not public, however, meaning they have a choice over whether or not they remain open.", "The majority of businesses choose to close on Thanksgiving Day, to allow employees to be with their loved ones, but this is not always the case.", "
Are Stores Are Open on Thanksgiving 2021?
", "For the stores that have some branches open, the best way to find out their specific opening hours is by consulting your local store, as opening times will differ from branch to branch.", "Other than stores, most public offices are closed, such as the United States Postal Service (USPS) which resumes its service on Black Friday.", "Similarly, many banks are closed on Thanksgiving, as well as federal offices.", "", "
The exterior of a Walmart store in North Bergen, New Jersey, seen on August 23, 2020.
"]
